name: Infrigidate
display_help: Fires a frigid beam of cold at a single target. This beam dramatically reduces the targets attack rate, movement speed and Defense. Infrigidate draws so much heat out of the target that the damage of any of its Fire attacks will be reduced. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your attack rate, movement speed, Defense, and Fire Damage have been reduced

messages.display_attacker_hit: You reduce the attack rate, movement speed, Defense, and Fire Damage of {PlayerDest}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your attack rate, movement speed, Defense, and Fire Damage.

name: Ice_Shield
display_help: Casts a rock hard Ice Shield on one of your allies and grants them Defense to Melee, Lethal attacks and damage resistance to Cold and Fire damage. You cannot stack multiple Ice Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Glacial Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Melee, Smash, Lethal), Res(Cold, Fire)
display_target_help: You now have greater Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold and Fire damage.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing and Lethal attacks and increase their Resistance to Fire and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
display_victim_hit: You now have greater Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold and Fire damage.

name: Snow_Storm
display_help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. The torrent winds of the Snow Storm are enough to bring down flying foes. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your attack rate and running speed have been reduced by the Snow Storm. The Torrent winds are hindering your ability to Fly.
display_attacker_hit: You slow the attack and movement speed of all foes near {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
display_victim_hit: Your attack speed and movement rate have been slowed by {PlayerSource}.

name: Glacial_Shield
display_help: Envelopes an ally in gleaming Glacial Ice. Its crystalline structure has refracting properties that grants the target good Defense against Area Effect, Ranged, Energy and Negative Energy attacks. Glacial Shield also grants the target some damage resistance to Cold. You cannot stack multiple Glacial Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Ice Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Ranged, AoE, Energy, Negative), Res(Cold)
display_target_help: You now have greater Defense to Energy and Negative Energy attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold damage.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Energy and Negative Energy attacks and increase their Resistance to Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
display_victim_hit: You now have greater Defense to Energy and Negative Energy attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold damage.

name: Frostwork
display_help: Covers an ally in a thick layer of Frost. The frost can absorb the impact from enemy attacks, effectively increasing your ally's maximum Hit Points for a short time. Frostwork also grants your ally resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
display_target_help: Your maximum health is increased and you have some resistance to toxic damage.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases the maximum Hit Points or {PlayerDest} and grants them some resistance to Toxic damage.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} has increases your maximum Hit Points with {PowerName} and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage.

name: Arctic_Fog
display_help: Your mastery of Cold allows you to hide yourself and all nearby allies within thick Arctic Fog. Arctic Fog makes you and your allies harder to see and increases your Defense to area effect, melee and ranged attacks, as well as your resistance to Slow, Fire, Cold, and Energy damage. You cannot use any other Concealment type powers while using Arctic Fog. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF, +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Slow)
display_target_help: The Arctic Fog is making you more difficult to detect. This increases your Defense and gives you some resistance to Fire, Cold, Energy and Slow.
display_attacker_hit: You hide {PlayerDest} within your {PowerName}.
display_victim_hit: You are hidden within the {PowerName}.

name: Benumb
display_help: Numbs a single target to its very core. Benumb reduces the target's core body temperature, dramatically weakening them. A Benumbed target's Damage and Regeneration Rate are greatly reduced. Additionally, the affected target's secondary power effects are all weakened. The target's powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all weakened. Recharge: Long
display_target_help: Your Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects have all been reduced.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects of {PlayerDest}.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} shocks you with their {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

name: Sleet
display_help: Summons a Sleet Storm at a targeted location. Sleet deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
display_target_help: The Fog is causing cold damage to you and has reduced your damage potential, resistance, attack rate and running speed.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You call forth {PowerName}!

name: Heat_Loss
display_help: Heat Loss drains the heat from your enemies and transfers that energy to your allies in the form of Endurance. All foes near the selected target may experience a Heat Loss, which will drain their Endurance, Slow them, and reduce their Damage Resistance. Each enemy target that is successfully drained of Heat will expel that energy to all your nearby allies, granting them Endurance and a boost to their Endurance Recovery. Some Endurance and Recovery will also be transferred directly to you and any allies near you. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You drain the heat from {PlayerDest}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} drains the heat from you with their {PowerName}!

name: Twilight_Grasp
display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's chance to hit, damage and regeneration rate are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your chance to hit and Damage potential.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} captures you in their {PowerName}, reducing your damage, To Hit and regeneration rate!

name: Tar_Patch
display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets stuck in the Tar Patch cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your Running speed and damage resistance is reduced by the Tar Patch. You cannot jump or fly away while in the Tar Patch

messages.display_attacker_hit: You turn the ground into a sticky {PowerName}, reducing your foes movement rate and resistance to damage!

name: Darkest_Night
display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Moderate

display_help: Activating this power channels the power of the Netherworld to weaken your foes, in an attempt to revive all nearby fallen allies. You must stand near your defeated allies to revive them, then select a foe. The selected foe and all nearby foes will be Slowed, Disoriented, have their Regeneration rate reduced and drained of some life. Revived allies will have full Hit Points and Endurance and will be protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Ranged (AoE), Minor DMG(Negative), Target Slow, -Recharge, -Regen, Disorient, Ally Rez

display_short_help: Ally Strong Heal, Self Moderate DMG(Special)

display_help: Frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow

display_help: Increases an ally's mass, freeing them from any Disorient, Immobilization, or Hold effects and leaving them resistant to such effects for a while. The small explosive flash of energy does only minor damage, but the concussion can weaken foes. Affected targets will have reduced Damage, Accuracy and Perception and may even be Disoriented for a short while. You can only ever have Two Seeker Drones out at one time and they can be destroyed by your foes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Summon Seekers: Ranged Disorient, -DMG, -ACC, -Perception, Low DMG(Energy)

name: Trip_Mine
display_help: You can place a Trip Mine on the ground. Any foes that pass near the Trip Mine will cause it to explode, severely damaging all nearby foes and sending them flying. The Trip Mine is almost impossible to detect, but it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Trip Mine will detonate. Setting a mine is delicate work, and if you are interrupted, you will fail. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Time_Bomb
display_help: You can place a Time Bomb on the ground. The Time Bomb will detonate 15 seconds after being placed, resulting in a massive explosion that can devastate all nearby foes and send them flying. The Time Bomb is small, and almost impossible to detect. However, it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Bomb will still detonate. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long

name: Entangling_Arrow
display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities, halts jumping and slows all of your actions. Entangling Arrow has a fairly low Endurance cost and a bonus to its Accuracy. Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your actions are slowed.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

name: Flash_Arrow
display_help: This arrow explodes in a dazzling flash of light and sound. The targets are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: The flash of light has left you dazzled. Your chance to hit and range of sight are greatly diminished.

name: Glue_Arrow
display_help: This arrow carries a cartridge of intensely sticky glue, which explodes on impact. The glue slows the movement and attack rates of any foes in the area. Recharge: Very Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You use a {PowerName} to create a sticky patch of ground!

name: Ice_Arrow
display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

name: Poison_Gas_Arrow
display_help: This arrow carries a capsule cloud of poisonous gas, which explodes on impact and weakens all foes in its vicinity. Affected foes damage potential will be severely reduced. Some foes will react badly to the poison and choke for a time, though they will react if attacked. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You use a {PowerName} to release a noxious poison gas!

name: Acid_Arrow
display_help: This arrow explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as their Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your Resistances and Defense have been weakened by the Acid Arrow.

name: Disruption_Arrow
display_help: This arrow plants a sonic resonator at a target location. The vibrations of the resonator weaken the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Long
display_target_help: The Disruption Arrow has lowered your Resistances.

name: Oil_Slick_Arrow
display_help: On impact, this arrow creates an oil slick that Slows foes in the area and may cause them to slip and fall. The oil slick is very flammable and may burst into flames if fire is used near it. Recharge: Long
display_target_help: The oil slick has reduced your running speed.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You coat the ground in oil from your {PowerName}!

name: EMP_Arrow
display_help: This arrow can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery
display_target_help: You are held immobile by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.
